title: 48 Nostalgic Similarities Between THE MIGHTY DUCKS (1992) and THE MIGHTY DUCKS: GAME CHANGERS (2021)
author: Think Story
comment: I played 4 years of hockey here in Canada and was selected for a "MVP" game which I later learned was comprised of the two worst players on every team in the league to give them more practice. It was a traumatizing experience.
They actually did have some scenes at school in the movies. Did you forget about quacking at the principal? 😂
There was a relationship between Connie and Guy in the original
If by showing no romance in the original means just D1 or original trilogy. There is Guy and Connie in D1, Charlie and Linda in D3, Luis and cheerleader girl in D3, and Juile and Scooter in D3
I really enjoyed the show! Didn’t think I would.
description:
The Mighty Ducks was one of my favorite movies growing up so I decided to take a look at Disney's latest tv show The Mighty Ducks: Game Changers to see what's different and similar.

Check out my other comparison videos here:
